incomeArray.description: Each item in this array represents one income line. The group in which it belongs in is identified by group name

incomeGroupName.description: Identifies the income group this item belongs in. Like 'general', 'budgetForProjectAndDevelopment', 'budgetForOperatingAndArtsTeaching', etc.

label.desciption: For future use, field's name in the UI

otherIncomeArray.description: Each item in this array represents one income line. The group in which it belongs in is identified by group name. ID of the income is not restricted, as the applicant may write the type name by himself/herself.

incomeGroupName.description: Identifies the income group this item belongs in. Like 'general', 'budgetForProjectAndDevelopment', 'budgetForOperatingAndArtsTeaching', etc.

ID.description: Identifies the data of the array item. The applicant usually writes this for the income row as the name of the income

costsArray.description: Each item (array) in this array represents one cost item.  The group in which it belongs in is identified by group name
